authors: Steve K., Shawn G., Natha, Primal Zed, Constantine F., Adolfo Domingues
instructions:
The New World of Darkness sheet supports both first and second edition mechanics.
It supports:
* **1st Edition:** Chronicles of Darkness, Vampire, Werewolf, Mage, Promethean, Hunter, Changeling, Geist, and Mummy
* **2nd Edition:** Chronicles of Darkness, Vampire, Werewolf, Mage, Promethean, Changeling, Demon, Geist, and Beast

Checkout the [Sheet Guide](https://wiki.roll20.net/New_World_Of_Darkness_Official_Sheet) to get the most out of the new functionality of the official sheet.
